content: suzette is a 10 inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook approx 104 m/ 114 yards of yarn needed would you like to use aran/worsted weight yarn with hook size 5 5mm it will give you a 12 inch square you will need 25% more yarn you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme which are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts per round used there are also directions for one colour added in the file the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio the pattern is available in us and uk terms l♥ve ineke
